About this module
-----------------

This module gathers a set of tools for both measurement and analysis of
experimental data associated with modulation instability studies on a
parametrically driven system. 

:Authors:
    Samantha Kucher & Pablo Cobelli, Ph.D.

:Affiliation: 
    Departamento de Fisica,
    Facultad de Ciencias Exactas y Naturales,
    Universidad de Buenos Aires, Argentina

:Version: 
    1.0 of 2018/06/01

:License:
    To be determined.
